0: Excellent hotel in a good location and very reasonably priced for NYC

Good location and value for price but not 4 stars
Also loved that you have the option to stow your luggage free of charge after you check out
There was a great little diner across the road called Scotys which did great breakfast lunch and dinner at affordable prices
Solid well priced hotel in Murray Hill
Beautiful hotel with a reasonable price
This Hotel is excellently positioned near Empire State Central Station Chrystler Building many eateries nearby and very reasonably priced
Great hotel huge room very reasonable price
1: Movies are also expensive but I think that is the same in many of the better hotels
Nonetheless he did some odd math and put in a price that was not the actual price
As for providing a 10 credit for snacks drinks it is absurd and frankly insulting to human intelligence to charge such OUTRAGEOUS prices
Would rather just not have to pay this money in the first place
Is is neither of these things but I did not expect them for what I paid
We used valet for our car 70 dollars for 24 hours

We would rather see the room be 40 more up front when looking at pricing than to see a low rate and then be reminded that it is really plus 40 per night for items that might appeal to some people but not to us
They add a facility fee so the nightly fee is actually 35 higher than the listed price
Seems all nyc hotels add a local 40 dollars a day so Expedia discounted price is not what it seems
